name: Mimic Dungeon
description:
Help the Wizard escape the dungeon by killing enemies with the staff that makes everyone copy his moves

(For a better experience we recommend playing on PC/Mac)

                                       How to Play                     

When you walk all the enemies will copy you

To kill an enemy you need to usa a trap

Controls
